actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Procurement and Military Nuclear Systems.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Procurement and Military Nuclear Systems

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the Department of Defense should place a greater emphasis on the remanufacture of existing mililtary equipment as an interim measure to maintain readiness in light of budget constraints, production delays and cost overruns of new equipment.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Department of Defense should place a greater emphasis on the remanufacture of existing military equipment as an interim measure to maintain readiness in light of budget constraints, production delays, and cost overruns of new equipment.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the Department of Defense should place a greater emphasis on the remanufacture of existing mililtary equipment as an interim measure to maintain readiness in light of budget constraints, production delays and cost overruns of new equipment.
